1.job_description: As a DevOps engineer I am mainly focus on building and maintaining automation tools for our Cloud Operation. Other main responsibilities include critical incident and problem management.

2.job_description: As a freelancer my time is mainly occupied with client side projects. Some of those projects include web development using frameworks such as Django, Flask, Woordpress and Shopify.

3.job_description: As a network and system administrator I was responsible for maintaining the network and system infrastructure of the company. My main tasks include but are not limited to installing, configuring and maintaining various services that support company needs (iSCSI, SMB, Ansible, DNS, Logging, Monitoring, Networking, etc). Besides the system administration, I was responsible for the network infrastructure by configuring and maintaining all network equipment that includes Cisco, Nexus and MikroTik devices. Additionally I had built several internal tools that supports engineers day to day tasks using Python, Javascript, Bash, etc.

4.job_description: As a researcher I have been working on several European projects including 3D technologies such as modelling, printing, visualization, etc.. In addition to that I have been working on a prototype vehicle powered by a hydrogen fuel cell and competing in the Shell Eco Marathon events. My PhD revolves around distributed SDN networks and traffic load handling.

5.job_description: As a IT field engineer I was mainly responsible for physical expanding ISP's layer 2 network infrastructure. Other responsibilities of mine were configuring, deploying, and maintaining various network and system infrastructure.
